skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To use this skill, you need to have installed and configured the MyHome_Up system in your house.
Moreover, you need to allow third-party access by creating a Legrand account; to do so, follow the procedure in the MyHome_Up app:
- open the app and connect with Administrator profile to your installation on your Android or iOS device
- select Integrations on the More page
- tap Eliot Account
- if you already have a Legrand account, sign in now
- otherwise, select Sign up now and follow the procedure
- once you are signed in, register your installation
- you can now enable the skill from Alexa app

With this skill you can:
- turn on and off lights
- regulate light brightness
- set light color
- turn on and off plugs
- raise and lower shades and blinds
- activate scenes
- create and control groups of devices

Products commands:
- Outlets
"Alexa, turn on the coffee machine"
"Alexa, turn off the camera"

- Lights
"Alexa, turn on the spots"
"Alexa, turn off ceiling light"
"Alexa, set ceiling light to thirty percent"
"Alexa, set ceiling light to blue"

- Shades
"Alexa, close bedroom blind"
"Alexa, open office shutter to fifty percent"
"Alexa, lower kitchen shade by twenty percent" 

- Scenes
"Alexa, activate Exit"
